name: ms-appinsights.ReleaseAnnotation
description: Mark releases on Application Insights timelines.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application Insights Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the Application Insights resource that is monitoring the service that you are deploying in the release flow. Find it in the API access blade

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key to the Application Insights resource that is monitoring the service that you are deploying to. Find it in API access blade. Specify variable ApiKey in the Configuration tab.

inputs.name: userEnv
inputs.label: User environment, temporary for bug bash

inputs.name: releaseName
inputs.label: Release name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release name, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: releaseId
inputs.label: Release id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release Id, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: releaseDescription
inputs.label: Release description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release description, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: releaseDefinitionName
inputs.label: Release definition name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release definition name, default obtained from release template

inputs.name: releaseEnvironmentName
inputs.label: Release environment name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release environment name, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: teamFoundationCollectionUri
inputs.label: TF Collection URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Team foundation collection URI, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: releaseRequestedFor
inputs.label: Release requestor
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release run requested by, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: releaseRequestedForId
inputs.label: Release requestor Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of release run requested by, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deployment build number, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: sourceBranch
inputs.label: Source branch name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source branch name, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: buildRepositoryName
inputs.label: Build Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build repository name, default obtained from release template run

inputs.name: buildRepositoryProvider
inputs.label: Build repository provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build repository provider, default obtained from release template run
